title: Problems with chat connection
body:
Hey, 

I seem to have problems playing the game when I play with my brother (same network). I keep getting disconnected from the chat and therefor in champion select cannot ban or pick a champion. the timer to choose gets stuck at zero and I just stay indefinetly in the screen untill I restart.
Any clues on to why this happens and does anyone have a fix for this?

Kind regards, 

SaneShadow

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble staying connected, and losing sync in champion select.  When you join champion select, the server groups everyone together but you're getting left behind.  Your brother may have his setting configured to play without issues, but you could have a wonky configuration or even hardware problem.  The best way to really know for sure is to go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Follow each step, and this should get fixed up!

Hey, 

Thanks for the quick answer. The thing is that I don't have this issue while playing alone. It only occurs when we queue together for a game.

Kind regards, 

SaneShadow
